report.title: Species counts by location using standard filter params 2
report.description: Lists locations with mappable boundary output and the number of species within them. Requires a public and indexed location type which is flagged as unique in the location index builder.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct o.taxon_meaning_id) as count FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false and lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON o.#location_type_field#=l.id #agreements_join# #joins# AND #sharing_filter# AND o.zero_abundance='f' #filters# #idlist# WHERE l.deleted=false AND (l.public=true or lw.id IS NOT NULL) AND (l.code NOT LIKE ('%+%') OR l.code IS NULL) GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: location_type_field
param.description: Location ID fieldname in cache_occurrences_functional for grouping, e.g. location_id_vice_county.

column.name: value
column.sql: count || case '#valueSuffix#' when '' then '' else ' ' || '#valueSuffix#' end

column.name: fs
column.sql: case when count>1000 then #baseFontSize# else #baseFontSize#+1 end
